CustomField.formula: IF( QLI_Record_Type__c = 'PG_PMP_Quote' && Package_Line_Item__c = null && Pricebook_Name__c = 'Advertising NA', Budget__c * 0.95, IF( AE__c = TRUE && BEGINS(Pricebook_Name__c, 'AU'), Amount_Net__c * 0.9, IF( AE__c = TRUE && NOT(BEGINS(Pricebook_Name__c,'AU')), Amount_Net__c * 0.85, Amount_Net__c * 1) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Discounted amount less agency commission if present
CustomField.label: Amount Net2eBay
